languages.text: На этой планете, как выяснилось, обитает вид огромных насекомых, напоминающих муравьев. Как и муравьи, эти существа способны на формирование "спиралей смерти" — губительных хороводов, где каждое насекомое движется след в след за идущим впереди, не ведая, что их движение нечаянно замкнулось в круг. Именно эти круги обнаружили наблюдатели корабля. Феномен, в котором подозревали проявление варпа или постройку зловещих ксеносов, на деле оказался всего лишь причудой природы, пусть и несколько печальной.

traits.locale_text: На этой планете, как выяснилось, обитает вид огромных насекомых, напоминающих муравьев. Как и муравьи, эти существа способны на формирование "спиралей смерти" — губительных хороводов, где каждое насекомое движется след в след за идущим впереди, не ведая, что их движение нечаянно замкнулось в круг. Именно эти круги обнаружили наблюдатели корабля. Феномен, в котором подозревали проявление варпа или постройку зловещих ксеносов, на деле оказался всего лишь причудой природы, пусть и несколько печальной.

languages.text: It has emerged that this planet has a native species of giant insect similar to Terran ants. Just like ants, they sometimes form so-called death spirals, in which one creature follows another without realising they're going in circles. These were the rings discovered by the ship's observers. The strange phenomenon that was originally suspected to be a sign of warp activity or a nefarious xenos structure turned out to be a quirk of nature, and a tragic one at that.
languages.original_text: На этой планете, как выяснилось, обитает вид огромных насекомых, напоминающих муравьев. Как и муравьи, эти существа способны на формирование "спиралей смерти" — губительных хороводов, где каждое насекомое движется след в след за идущим впереди, не ведая, что их движение нечаянно замкнулось в круг. Именно эти круги обнаружили наблюдатели корабля. Феномен, в котором подозревали проявление варпа или постройку зловещих ксеносов, на деле оказался всего лишь причудой природы, пусть и несколько печальной.

traits.locale_text: Apparently this planet has a native species of giant insects similar to terran ants. Just like ants, they sometimes form so-called death spirals, following one another without realizing they're moving in circles. These were the circles that the surveyors had seen from orbit. The strange phenomenon that was tied to Warp activity or malicious Xenos structures turned out to be a whim of nature.

The strange phenomenon that was tied to Warp activity or malicious Xenos structures turned out to be a whim of nature.

Apparently this planet has a native species of giant insects similar to Terran ants. Just like ants, they sometimes form so-called death spirals, following one another without realizing they're moving in circles. These were the circles that the surveyors had seen from orbit. The strange phenomenon that was originally suspected to be caused by warp activity or malicious xeno structures turned out to be a whim of nature, and a tragic one at that.

It has emerged that this planet has a native species of giant insect similar to Terran ants. Just like ants, they sometimes form so-called death spirals, in which one creature follows another without realising they're going in circles. These were the rings discovered by the ship's observers. The strange phenomenon that was originally suspected to be a sign of warp activity or a nefarious xenos structure turned out to be a quirk of nature, and a tragic one at that.

It has emerged that this planet has a native species of giant insect similar to Terran ants. Just like ants, they sometimes form so-called death spirals, in which one creature follows another without realising they're going in circles. These were the rings discovered by the ship's observers. The strange phenomenon that was originally suspected to be a sign of warp activity or a nefarious xenos structure turned out to be a quirk of nature, and a tragic one at that.

It has emerged that this planet has a native species of giant insect similar to Terran ants. Just like ants, they sometimes form so-called death spirals, in which one creature follows another without realising they're going in circles. These were the rings discovered by the ship's observers. The strange phenomenon that was originally suspected to be a sign of warp activity or a nefarious xenos structure turned out to be a quirk of nature, and a tragic one at that.

languages.text: 这颗行星上居住着某种巨型昆虫，样子与泰拉的蚂蚁非常类似。它们就像蚂蚁一样，有时会形成所谓的“死亡螺旋”。发生这种情况时，每一只蚂蚁都会跟着前面的蚂蚁走，丝毫意识不到所有蚂蚁都在不停地绕圈子。这座环形山是由船上的观察员发现的，他们本以为这是某种亚空间活动，或是某种邪恶的异形建筑，但最终却发现这是自然界的古怪现象，是由无数蚂蚁上演的一出悲剧。
languages.original_text: It has emerged that this planet has a native species of giant insect similar to Terran ants. Just like ants, they sometimes form so-called death spirals, in which one creature follows another without realising they're going in circles. These were the rings discovered by the ship's observers. The strange phenomenon that was originally suspected to be a sign of warp activity or a nefarious xenos structure turned out to be a quirk of nature, and a tragic one at that.

traits.locale_text: 这颗行星上居住着某种巨型昆虫，样子与泰拉的蚂蚁非常类似。它们就像蚂蚁一样，有时会形成所谓的“死亡螺旋”。发生这种情况时，每一只蚂蚁都会跟着前面的蚂蚁走，丝毫意识不到所有蚂蚁都在不停地绕圈子。这座环形山是由船上的观察员发现的，他们本以为这是某种亚空间活动，或是某种邪恶的异形建筑，但最终却发现这是自然界的古怪现象，是由无数蚂蚁上演的一出悲剧。

languages.text: Se ha descubierto que este planeta tiene una especie nativa de insectos gigantes similares a las hormigas de Terra. Al igual que ellas, en ocasiones forman las llamadas espirales de muerte en las que una criatura sigue a otra sin comprender que está moviéndose en círculos. Esos eran los anillos que descubrieron los observadores de la nave. El llamativo fenómeno que originalmente parecía ser consecuencia de la disformidad o una peligrosa estructura xenos resultó ser una trágica curiosidad de la naturaleza.
languages.original_text: It has emerged that this planet has a native species of giant insect similar to Terran ants. Just like ants, they sometimes form so-called death spirals, in which one creature follows another without realising they're going in circles. These were the rings discovered by the ship's observers. The strange phenomenon that was originally suspected to be a sign of warp activity or a nefarious xenos structure turned out to be a quirk of nature, and a tragic one at that.

traits.locale_text: Se ha descubierto que este planeta tiene una especie nativa de insectos gigantes similares a las hormigas de Terra. Al igual que ellas, en ocasiones forman las llamadas espirales de muerte en las que una criatura sigue a otra sin comprender que está moviéndose en círculos. Esos eran los anillos que descubrieron los observadores de la nave. El llamativo fenómeno que originalmente parecía ser consecuencia de la disformidad o una peligrosa estructura xenos resultó ser una trágica curiosidad de la naturaleza.

languages.text: この惑星には、地球のアリに似た巨大な昆虫の原種が存在することが判明している。この昆虫はアリと同じで、生物が別の生物の後を意図せずについて回るような、いわゆる死のスパイラルを形成することがあり、これは本船の観測隊が発見したリングである。〈歪み〉の痕跡か邪悪な異種族の建造物かと思われたこの奇妙な現象は、実は偶然の産物であり、そして悲劇的なものであった。
languages.original_text: It has emerged that this planet has a native species of giant insect similar to Terran ants. Just like ants, they sometimes form so-called death spirals, in which one creature follows another without realising they're going in circles. These were the rings discovered by the ship's observers. The strange phenomenon that was originally suspected to be a sign of warp activity or a nefarious xenos structure turned out to be a quirk of nature, and a tragic one at that.

traits.locale_text: この惑星には、地球（テラ）のアリに似た巨大な昆虫の原種が存在することが判明している。この昆虫はアリと同じで、生物が別の生物の後を意図せずについて回るような、いわゆる死のスパイラルを形成することがあり、これは本船の観測隊が発見したリングである。〈歪み〉の痕跡か邪悪な異種族（ゼノ）の建造物かと思われたこの奇妙な現象は、実は偶然の産物であり、そして悲劇的なものであった。

languages.text: Es hat sich herausgestellt, dass auf diesem Planeten eine riesige Insektenart heimisch ist, die terranischen Ameisen ähnelt. Genau wie Ameisen bilden sie manchmal so genannte Todesspiralen, bei denen eine Kreatur einer anderen folgt, ohne zu merken, dass sie sich im Kreis bewegen. Das waren die Ringe, die vom Schiff aus zu sehen waren. Das merkwürdige Phänomen, das ursprünglich als Zeichen von Warp-Aktivität oder als schändliches Xenos-Gebilde angesehen wurde, entpuppte sich als Laune der Natur — und zwar als tragische.
languages.original_text: It has emerged that this planet has a native species of giant insect similar to Terran ants. Just like ants, they sometimes form so-called death spirals, in which one creature follows another without realising they're going in circles. These were the rings discovered by the ship's observers. The strange phenomenon that was originally suspected to be a sign of warp activity or a nefarious xenos structure turned out to be a quirk of nature, and a tragic one at that.

traits.locale_text: Es hat sich herausgestellt, dass auf diesem Planeten eine riesige Insektenart heimisch ist, die terranischen Ameisen ähnelt. Genau wie Ameisen bilden sie manchmal so genannte Todesspiralen, bei denen eine Kreatur einer anderen folgt, ohne zu merken, dass sie sich im Kreis bewegen. Das waren die Ringe, die vom Schiff aus zu sehen waren. Das merkwürdige Phänomen, das ursprünglich als Zeichen von Warp-Aktivität oder als schändliches Xenos-Gebilde angesehen wurde, entpuppte sich als Laune der Natur — und zwar als tragische.

languages.text: Il a été découvert que cette planète abritait une espèce indigène d'insectes géants similaires aux fourmis de Terra. Comme les fourmis, elles forment parfois des « spirales de la mort » lors desquelles un individu en suit un autre sans réaliser qu'ils tournent en rond. C'est ce qui explique les cercles observés par le personnel du vaisseau. Cet étrange phénomène que l'on a d'abord soupçonné d'être un signe d'activité du Warp ou encore une infâme structure xénos n'est en réalité qu'une bizarrerie de la nature, qui se trouve être assez tragique.
languages.original_text: It has emerged that this planet has a native species of giant insect similar to Terran ants. Just like ants, they sometimes form so-called death spirals, in which one creature follows another without realising they're going in circles. These were the rings discovered by the ship's observers. The strange phenomenon that was originally suspected to be a sign of warp activity or a nefarious xenos structure turned out to be a quirk of nature, and a tragic one at that.

traits.locale_text: Il a été découvert que cette planète abritait une espèce indigène d'insectes géants similaires aux fourmis de Terra. Comme les fourmis, elles forment parfois des « spirales de la mort » lors desquelles un individu en suit un autre sans réaliser qu'ils tournent en rond. C'est ce qui explique les cercles observés par le personnel du vaisseau. Cet étrange phénomène que l'on a d'abord soupçonné d'être un signe d'activité du Warp ou encore une infâme structure xénos n'est en réalité qu'une bizarrerie de la nature, qui se trouve être assez tragique.

languages.text: Bu gezegende Terra karıncalarına benzeyen, dev bir böcek türünün yaşadığı ortaya çıkıyor. Tıpkı karıncalar gibi bu canlılar da bazen ölüm sarmalları olarak adlandırılan ve bir canlının bir diğerini takip ettiği halkalar oluşturuyor. Geminin gözlemcilerinin keşfettiği halkaların bunlar olduğu anlaşılıyor. Başlangıçta öteboyut faaliyeti veya hain bir zeno yapısı olduğundan şüphelenilen bu garip fenomen, doğanın trajik bir cilvesi olarak kayıtlara geçiyor.
languages.original_text: It has emerged that this planet has a native species of giant insect similar to Terran ants. Just like ants, they sometimes form so-called death spirals, in which one creature follows another without realising they're going in circles. These were the rings discovered by the ship's observers. The strange phenomenon that was originally suspected to be a sign of warp activity or a nefarious xenos structure turned out to be a quirk of nature, and a tragic one at that.
